title: Institutions, essays, and maxims, political, moral, and divine divided into four centuries / by the Right Honoura[ble] L. Marqu. of H[alifax]
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
publisher: Printed for, and are to be so[ld by] Josias Shaw ...,
notes: A reprint of Francis Quarles' Enchiridion with slight differences in arrangement of material -- NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: torn, stained and tightly bound, with print show-through and some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
